short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Sites that are distracting you from your work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlockIt 

Boost your productivity with BlockIt This powerful tool helps you stay focused by blocking distracting websites that you specify. Simply input the URLs of the sites you find distracting, and the extension will take care of the rest. When you attempt to visit a blocked site, you'll be automatically redirected, keeping you on track and minimizing distractions.

Key Features:

Customizable Block List: Easily add and remove websites from your block list to suit your productivity needs.

Automatic Redirection: When you try to access a blocked site, the extension redirects you to a different page, helping you stay focused.

Simple Interface: User-friendly design makes it easy to manage your blocked sites and enhance your productivity.

Stay productive and focused with the Productivity Blocker Extension, your simple solution for managing online distractions.
